#Text=Croton-on-Hudson
#Text=Croton-on-Hudson is a village in Westchester County , New York .
#Text=By plane
#Text=Westchester County Airport , 240 Airport Road , White Plains , +1 914 995-4860 ( airlines ) .
#Text=The closest airport , about 40 minutes drive .
#Text=Rental cars are available .
#Text=Stewart International Airport , 1180 First St , New Windsor , +1 845 564-2100.
#Text=Another alternative to the congestion of the 3 major airports , but at present offers few direct flights .

#Text=Newark Liberty International Airport , Newark , New Jersey , John F. Kennedy International Airport , and LaGuardia Airport : The three major international airports in the New York City area offer service to just about anywhere .
#Text=Westchester-based taxi and livery cars offer regular service to and from the three internationals from most areas of the county .
#Text=New York City yellow cabs will take to you Westchester in a pinch , but the fares can be exorbitant .
#Text=Instead , ask if your hotel offers shuttle service .
#Text=By car
#Text=Take 9A North or 9A South depending on where you are coming from .
#Text=Then you can get off at the Senasqua exit , Croton Harmon Exit or the Cortlandt Manor exit
#Text=By train
#Text=Metro-North Railroad – Hudson Line .
#Text=Express service between Croton-Harmon station and New York City 's Grand Central Terminal is about 50 minutes .
#Text=A one-way ticket to or from Grand Central costs $ 11.25 off-peak and $ 14.75 peak .
#Text=Local rail service is available between other Metro-North commuter stations .
#Text=Full weekday and weekend schedules are available online .
#Text=Taxis are usually available at the arrival of trains from New York City .
#Text=On all Metro-North trains , on-board fares are subject to a stiff surcharge , so buy your tickets at the station or at the vending machines .
#Text=Amtrak .
#Text=Long-distance connections are available in New York City 's Penn Station and at Metro-North 's Croton-Harmon station .
#Text=By bus
#Text=Bee Line System .
#Text=Westchester County 's bus service provides access to White Plains and other locations in the county .
#Text=Schedules and route maps are available on-line and at the Croton-Harmon train station .
#Text=See
#Text=Van Cortlandt Manor , 555 S Riverside Ave , ☏ +1914 271-8981 .
#Text=Stone manor house and outbuildings date to the Dutch colonial era .
#Text=This living history museum interprets Hudson Valley life in the years immediately after the American Revolution .
#Text=Do
#Text=Old Croton Aqueduct .
#Text=Go hiking or biking on the aqueduct 's trailway .
#Text=The original water supply to New York City is now a walking trail that runs from Croton-on-Hudson in the north to Yonkers in the south .
#Text=Over the 180 years since it was built portions have disappeared from the downtown areas of several river towns , so a map can be helpful .
#Text=Cornelia Cotton Gallery at 111 Grand Ave. sells maps of the trail .
#Text=Take sailing lessons .
#Text=Attend the Croton Sailing School , Senasqua Road , +1 914 -271-6868 ,
#Text=Go to Teatown Nature Reservation at 1600 Spring Valley road , +1 914 760-2912 , They have a kid-friendly nature center there with many East Coast animals on display .
#Text=They also have 13 hiking trails .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Groovy on Grand , 119 Grand St. Children 's clothing store .
#Text=Down Cycles , 2015 Albany Post Rd , ☏ +1914 827-9570 .
#Text=Bike renting and buying shop .
#Text=Budget
#Text=Blue Pig , 121 Maple St.
#Text=Homemade artisan ice cream shop and homemade soups !
#Text=The owner Lisa Moier makes this place feel just like home !
#Text=Mid-range
#Text=Justin Thyme , 171 Grand St , ☏ +1914 271-0022 .
#Text=Good food in a pub atmosphere .
#Text=Samuari Habachi Steak House , 352 S. Riverside Ave , ☏ +1914 271-8988 .
#Text=Everyone has been to a Japanese steak house , but this one is different .
#Text=They have sushi , hibachi , and many other things .
#Text=They have specialty drinks ranging in Japanese soda to dragon bowls .
#Text=Umami Cafe , 325 South Riverside Ave , ☏ +1 914-271-5555 .
#Text=Their food is a mix of Thai and American .
#Text=The owners infuse many different flavors together to make unique and memorable dishes .
#Text=Kid friendly also .
#Text=Memphis Mae ’s BBQ Bistro , 173 South Riverside Ave , ☏ +1 914-271-0125 .
#Text=Memphis Mae ’s is the first authentic southern BBQ restaurant in northern Westchester County .
#Text=But Mae ’s is much more than finger lickin ’ good BBQ – it is an eclectic delectable collection of down-home comfort food served in a warm bistro-style setting .
#Text=Hunan Wok , 125 Grand St , ☏ +1 914-271-1371 .
#Text=Chinese food .
#Text=Grouchy Gabe 's Grill , 8 Old Post Road South , ☏ +1 914-271-9690 .
#Text=Offering breakfast , lunch , and dinner items .
#Text=When you walk in the door you will find a few simple booths for dining , the works of our latest local artist on the walls and delicious food .
#Text=The owner is very nice , and you always get a great quick bite to eat .
#Text=Also ask about skillet night !
#Text=Mex-to-go , 345 South Riverside Ave , ☏ +1 914-271-8646 .
#Text=Serving Mexican food .
#Text=Mexican food on the go !
#Text=How could it get any better ?
#Text=they have all the authentic Mexican favorites , and make it possible for you to enjoy all of those South of the Border flavors on the go .
#Text=T.K. Casquarelli ’s , 440 South Riverside Dr , ☏ +1 914-271-2800 .
#Text=Handmade pizzas , specialty flatbreads , and a full Italian lunch and dinner menu .
#Text=Very good homestyle restaurant , friendly , and great service .
#Text=Ocean House ( Oyster Bar & Grill ) , 49 North Riverside Ave ( Route 9A ) , ☏ +1 914-271-0702 .
#Text=Oyster House is a small ( about 20-seat ) dinner-only Oyster Bar and Grill .
#Text=Self-taught chef Brian Galvin presents New England-style seashore fare .
#Text=Very romantic , and small .
#Text=Perfect for a date .
#Text=It used to be an old caboose diner , now it is an upscale fish restaurant , but there is limited space , you much go in that day and make a reservation because it fills up quickly !
#Text=Drink
#Text=Deprez Wines & Spirits , 440 S Riverside Ave , ☏ +1914 271-3200 .
#Text=Coffee
#Text=Black Cow Coffee Company , 51 Maple St , ☏ +1914 271-7544 .
#Text=M 6AM-6PM , Tu - F 6AM-9PM , Sa 7AM-9PM & Su 8AM-3PM .
#Text=Independent coffee house often features indie performer on Friday and Saturday nights .
#Text=They roast their own beans on premises .
#Text=Excellent coffee drinks .

#Text=This is different then other coffee houses because the owner imports many different coffee beans from all around the world , so you know if you go to the Black Cow your getting the best stuff on earth .
